subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Chien-Ming Wang improved to 5-0, striking out nine in seven innings and Melky Cabrera’s homer to left field off C. C. Sabathia in the fifth inning provided the only run.
snippet: Chien-Ming Wang improved to 5-0, striking out nine in seven innings and Melky Cabrera’s homer to left field off C. C. Sabathia in the fifth inning provided the only run.
